import { useContext } from 'react' import { ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, } from 'recharts' import MyTitle from '../../../../Components/MyTitle/MyTitle' import { Context } from '../../../../context' import './chart.scss' const data = [ { day: 'Mon', completed: 2 }, { day: 'Tue', completed: 5 }, { day: 'Wed', completed: 7 }, { day: 'Thu', completed: 3 }, { day: 'Fri', completed: 8 }, { day: 'Sat', completed: 4 }, { day: 'Sun', completed: 9 }, ] const Chart = () => { const { darkMode } = useContext(Context) return (
Progress chart
) } export default Chart
